title: Badlands Music Pack 2
description: Continue your adventures with Badlands Music Pack 2, music perfect for any post apocalyptic wasteland.
longDescription:
Badlands Music Pack 2 is the perfect companion to Badlands Music Pack 1, packed with a mixture of hybrid western, industrial and electronica styled music. Included are ambient tracks perfect for exploring any post apocalyptic wasteland and tension tracks designed for combating hordes of mutants or other foes. The main tracks are broken down into sub loops to give the user a broader spectrum of music.


LISTEN


Tracks included:


1. Desperado

  • Desperado - Full Loop Version
  • Desperado - Full Fade Version
  • Desperado - Ambient Loop
  • Desperado - Tension Loop
  • Desperado - Tension Loop 2


2. Dusty Road To Hell

  • Dusty Road To Hell - Full Loop Version
  • Dusty Road To Hell - Full Fade Version
  • Dusty Road To Hell - Ambient Loop
  • Dusty Road To Hell - Tension Loop 1
  • Dusty Road To Hell - Tension Loop 2
  • Dusty Road To Hell - Tension Loop 3


3. Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory

  • Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory - Full Loop Version
  • Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory - Full Fade Version
  • Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory - Ambient Loop
  • Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory - Tension Loop 1
  • Gas, Guns, Guts And Glory - Tension Loop 2

4. Lost

  • Lost - Full Loop Version
  • Lost - Full Fade Version
  • Lost - Ambient Loop 1
  • Lost - Tension Loop 1
  • Lost - Tension Loop 2


5. No Mans Land

  • No Mans Land - Full Loop Version
  • No Mans Land - Full Fade Version
  • No Mans Land - Ambient Loop 1
  • No Mans Land - Ambient Loop 2
  • No Mans Land - Ambient Loop 3
  • No Mans Land - Ambient Loop 4
  • No Mans Land - Tension Loop 1
  • No Mans Land - Tension Loop 2


6. Wasteland Raiders

  • Wasteland Raiders - Full Loop Version
  • Wasteland Raiders - Full Fade Version
  • Wasteland Raiders - Ambient Loop
  • Wasteland Raiders - Tension Loop 1
  • Wasteland Raiders - Tension Loop 2
  • Wasteland Raiders - Tension Loop 3

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 35


Number of Audio Cues: 35


Sample rate \ bit rate: (i.e. 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs): 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo Wave Files


Does music\audio loop: Yes


How many sound FX: 0


How many minutes of audio provided: Over 105mins of music


All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.
